Sentencas: Thin proton-conducting electrolyte with composition BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3-delta (BCGO) was prepared over substrates composed of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (CGO)-Ni by the dry-pressing method.
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were fabricated with the structure Ni-CGO/BCGO/Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCFO)-CGO.
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The performance of a single cell was tested at 600 and 650 degrees C, with ammonia directly used as fuel.
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The open circuit voltages (OCVs) were 1.12 and 1.1 V at 600 and 650 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The higher OCV may be due to both the compaction of the BCGO electrolyte (no porosity) and complete decomposition of ammonia.
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The maximum power density was 147 mW cm(-2) at 600 degrees
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: C. Comparisons of the cell with hydrogen as fuel indicate that ammonia can be treated as a substitute liquid fuel for SOFCs based on a proton-conducting solid electrolyte.
Titulo: Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte
Direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell based on thin proton-conducting electrolyte
